welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Whitburn, a charming seaside town known for its stunning coastline, friendly locals, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and truly experience all that our beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edinburgh Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Gates 1-10
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used for low-cost airlines and regional flights.

terminals.name: Gates 11-20
terminals.description: This terminal is used for international flights and some domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Perth Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glasgow International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: T2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
